mapper.select: select SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT from db_purchasepayment where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, SENDTIME, OPER, ACTIONMONEY, PURCHASETIME, PAYTYPE, PURCHASETIMESTR, EXPECTTIME, CREATEOPER, GROUPID, MONEYNEEDPAY, MONEYNOTPAY, SHIPNUM, PCMONEY, CHECKOPER, EXPRESSMONEY, MONEYPAIED, CHECKTIME, CREATETIME, MANUFACTUREID, RETURNMONEY, OPERTIME, MANUFACTURE, FLAG, PAYTIME, CONTENT from db_purchasepayment
mapper.sql: SID , SENDTIME , OPER , ACTIONMONEY , PURCHASETIME , PAYTYPE , PURCHASETIMESTR , EXPECTTIME , CREATEOPER , GROUPID , MONEYNEEDPAY , MONEYNOTPAY , SHIPNUM , PCMONEY , CHECKOPER , EXPRESSMONEY , MONEYPAIED , CHECKTIME , CREATETIME , MANUFACTUREID , RETURNMONEY , OPERTIME , MANUFACTURE , FLAG , PAYTIME , CONTENT

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ACTIONMONEY = #{actionmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
PURCHASETIME = #{purchasetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PAYTYPE = #{paytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PURCHASETIMESTR = #{purchasetimestr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EXPECTTIME = #{expecttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATEOPER = #{createoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYNEEDPAY = #{moneyneedpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MONEYNOTPAY = #{moneynotpay,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SHIPNUM = #{shipnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PCMONEY = #{pcmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EXPRESSMONEY = #{expressmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MONEYPAIED = #{moneypaied,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RETURNMONEY = #{returnmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PAYTIME = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
